metadata.title: CVE-2024-44308 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in Safari18.1.1, iOS 17.7.2 and iPadOS 17.7.2, macOS Sequoia 15.1.1, iOS 18.1.1 andiPadOS 18.1.1, visionOS 2.1.1. Processing maliciously crafted web contentmay lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that thisissue may have been actively exploited on Intel-based Mac systems.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
